scripts.api::start: APP=api AWS_REGION=eu-west-1 STAGE=DEV npm run start --workspace api
scripts.output-handler::start: APP=output-handler AWS_REGION=eu-west-1 STAGE=DEV npm run start --workspace output-handler
scripts.media-export::start: APP=media-export AWS_REGION=eu-west-1 STAGE=DEV npm run start --workspace media-export
scripts.worker-capacity-manager::start: APP=worker-capacity-manager AWS_REGION=eu-west-1 STAGE=DEV npm run start --workspace worker-capacity-manager
scripts.media-download::start: APP=media-download AWS_REGION=eu-west-1 STAGE=DEV npm run start --workspace media-download
scripts.worker::build: npm run build --workspace worker; npm run build --workspace worker
scripts.gpu-worker::start: APP=transcription-service-gpu-worker AWS_REGION=eu-west-1 STAGE=DEV pipenv run npm run start --workspace worker
scripts.cpu-worker::start: APP=transcription-service-worker AWS_REGION=eu-west-1 STAGE=DEV npm run start --workspace worker
scripts.package: mkdir -p target; zip -j target/output-handler.zip packages/output-handler/dist/index.js; zip -j target/media-export.zip packages/media-export/dist/index.js; zip -j target/worker-capacity-manager.zip packages/worker-capacity-manager/dist/index.js; mkdir -p build/client; mv packages/api/dist/index.js build; mv packages/client/out/* build/client; cd build; zip -qr ../target/api.zip *
scripts.emulate-prod-locally: npm run build --workspace client; EMULATE_PRODUCTION_SERVER=true npm run start --workspace api
